About me

I'm a college student at the University of Maryland. I guess you could say to kickback and relax would mean playing some video games or watching anime in my opinion. I've always been interested in photography and programming, so I thought I should combine my interests and create this site! After all, I need a place to showcase all of my photoshoots and projects.
